name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce.
instructions: Cook the pasta. In a separate pan, cook the meat with onions and tomatoes. Combine and serve.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crispy romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan.
instructions: Toss the lettuce with dressing, add croutons and cheese.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Spicy chicken in a creamy tomato sauce served with rice.
instructions: Marinate chicken. Cook in sauce until done. Serve with rice.
